data.name: Dream UniVRse Demo Demo
data.detailed_description:
Demo update 10/20/2016

+ Graphical settings enabled (Enjoy your antialiasing)
+ Lighting is now working properly
+ Losing in the water can level does not freeze the game anymore
+ Fixed bug that prevented the player from starting a second playthrough


About the Game

While we are sleeping, we visit the most different places and live the most exciting experiences: everything feels vivid and realistic. Dream UniVRse is a small indie collection of minigames set entirely in the dream world, every dream you visit presents you a new challenge to understand and complete in a few seconds.
It is the perfect game to show you and your friends the many possibilities of VR!

Features

  • Play 15 different exciting minigames (many more coming in the complete version), but don't lose yourself: the clock is always ticking!
  • Use every part of your body, the games are designed to show you the full potential of the HTC Vive!
  • Get the highest score with just three lives in the arcade mode!

data.short_description: Dream UniVRse is a collection of mini-games for VR that represents the perfect show reel for your VR setup. In this demo, you can try to get the highest score in the arcade mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
